name: Whirly Blocks - jumping ball bounce game
name_original: Whirly Blocks - jumping ball bounce game
description:
The rules of Whirling Blocks are simple. But how long will you live? Download NOW to find out.

> Avoid purple blocks
> Tap left side of screen to move blue ball to the left
> Tap right side of screen to move blue ball to the right
> Capture green blocks for power up that destroys all enemies
> Don't fall

See if you can beat your friends.
